channel.title: Memory leak!? Please help
channel.description:
I get this error when running my client any ideas or anything? [code]
BreakingPoint is loading.. successfully executed Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at Background.<init>(Background.java:32) at client.loadTitleScreen(client.java:3711) at client.startUp(client.java:8756) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6003) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:662) [/code]

item.title: Memory leak!? Please help
item.dc:creator: @tycooley tycooley
item.description:
@tycooley wrote:

[quote=“abtekk, post:4, topic:439612”] @echo off Title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\java.exe" -Xms256m -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit

Try that.[/quote]

Nope it still doesnt work i want al the way to 1500 and it works but after 30 sec it crashes haha and the log in screen in messed up

Read full topic

item.title: Memory leak!? Please help
item.dc:creator: @abtekk abtekk
item.description:
@abtekk wrote:

@echo off
Title Client
cd ./Class/
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\java.exe" -Xms256m -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
exit

Try that.

Read full topic

item.title: Memory leak!? Please help
item.dc:creator: @tycooley tycooley
item.description:
@tycooley wrote:

abtekk:

Java can’t allocate enough ram. Lower the -Xmx value in your run.bat and run in lowmem.

I made the -Xmx value go all the way to 100 but here is the code.

@echo off
Title Client
cd ./Class/
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
exit

Read full topic

item.title: Memory leak!? Please help
item.dc:creator: @abtekk abtekk
item.description:
@abtekk wrote:

Java can’t allocate enough ram. Lower the -Xmx value in your run.bat and run in lowmem.

item.title: Memory leak!? Please help
item.dc:creator: @tycooley tycooley
item.description:
@tycooley wrote:

I get this error when running my client any ideas or anything?


BreakingPoint is loading..
successfully executed
Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
        at Background.<init>(Background.java:32)
        at client.loadTitleScreen(client.java:3711)
        at client.startUp(client.java:8756)
        at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
        at client.run(client.java:6003)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:662)

Read full topic
